imdb.plot outline: Tall Ship Odyssey is a documentary series that will follow Captain Daniel Moreland, his wife Tammy, their son Dawson, and their 40 shipmates as they voyage to the far corners of the globe aboard the Barque Picton Castle. Daily life aboard this square-rigged training tall ship won't be a leisurely cocktail cruise in the tropics. The crew will have their physical strength and mental stamina continually tested as they adapt to their lack of privacy and learn how to live in close quarters and work together as a team.
imdb.title: Tall Ship Odyssey
plot: _Tall Ship Odyssey_ (qv) is a documentary series that will follow Captain Daniel Moreland, his wife Tammy, their son Dawson, and their 40 shipmates as they voyage to the far corners of the globe aboard the Barque Picton Castle. Daily life aboard this square-rigged training tall ship won't be a leisurely cocktail cruise in the tropics. The crew will have their physical strength and mental stamina continually tested as they adapt to their lack of privacy and learn how to live in close quarters and work together as a team.::Tell Tale Productions
